text: Melinda Marie Doolittle (born October 6, 1977) is an American singer. She was a third-place finalist on American Idol. ==Discography== ===EPs=== Album Cover Album Information Melinda Doolittle - EP *Released: June 12, 2007 (U.S) *RIAA certification: N/A *Peak Chart Position (iTunes Store): 53 ==Other websites== *Biography on American Idol * *Doolittle's credits on All Music Guide *Doolittle's MySpace site *Melinda's Backups - her support association *Melinda's Management Company Category:Singers from Tennessee Category:American Idol contestants Category:1977 births Category:Living people
title: Melinda Doolittle
